document.full_text: robert rizzo, the former city administrator for bell, california, at the center of a pay scandal over his $1.5 million in annual salary and benefits, pleaded not guilty on thursday to corruption charges.
document.title: city manager pleads not guilty in bell, california, pay scandal
lines_and_colors: robert rizzo, the former city administrator for bell, california, at the center of a pay scandal over his $1.5 million in annual salary and benefits, pleaded not guilty on thursday to corruption charges.
